CustomField.formula: IF( RC_Approval_Level_Calc__c = 1, (IMAGE('/img/samples/flag_red.gif', "") + " Manager"), IF( RC_Approval_Level_Calc__c = 2, (IMAGE('/img/samples/flag_red.gif', "") + " Director"), IF( RC_Approval_Level_Calc__c = 3, (IMAGE('/img/samples/flag_red.gif', "") + " VP"),"")))
CustomField.label: Approval
